creator: rich@atomic-x.co.uk
text: The documentation entitled "When not to use mod_rewrite" located at: http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/rewrite/avoid.html has a section entitled "Environment Variable Testing" which refers to the IF directive several times and links to http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/expr.html - the IF directive does not appear to exist in Apache 2.2 and the link to "expression evaluation documentation " returns a 404.
